tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE music_teachers (
    teacher_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    teacher_name TEXT,
    lesson_date DATE,
    lesson_time TIME,
    student_name TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Lessons (
    LessonID INT PRIMARY KEY,
    TeacherID INT,
    StudentID INT,
    LessonDate DATE,
    LessonTime TIME,
    LessonDuration INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (TeacherID) REFERENCES MusicTeachers(ID),
    FOREIGN KEY (StudentID) REFERENCES Students(StudentID)
);

CREATE TABLE LessonSchedule (
  lesson_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  teacher_id INT,
  student_id INT,
  lesson_date DATE,
  lesson_duration INT
);

CREATE TABLE Lesson_Schedule (
  lesson_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  teacher_id UUID REFERENCES Teachers(teacher_id),
  student_id UUID REFERENCES Students(student_id),
  lesson_date DATE,
  lesson_duration INTERVAL
)

CREATE TABLE Teachers (
  teacher_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  teacher_name VARCHAR(50),
  teaching_subject VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE Students (
  student_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  student_name VARCHAR(50),
  student_grade INTEGER
)

CREATE TABLE Calendar (
  calendar_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  teacher_id UUID REFERENCES Teachers(teacher_id),
  lesson_id UUID REFERENCES Lesson_Schedule(lesson_id),
  lesson_date DATE,
  lesson_duration INTERVAL
)
CREATE TABLE Music_Teachers (teacher_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, teacher_name VARCHAR(50), teaching_experience INT, teaching_specialization VARCHAR(50), teaching_location VARCHAR(50));
CREATE TABLE Students (student_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, student_name VARCHAR(50), student_age INT, student_contact VARCHAR(20), student_email VARCHAR(50));
CREATE TABLE Lesson_Schedule (lesson_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, teacher_id UUID, student_id UUID, lesson_date DATE, lesson_time TIME, lesson_duration INT, lesson_location VARCHAR(50));
CREATE TABLE Teaching_Calendar (calendar_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, teacher_id UUID, calendar_month VARCHAR(10), calendar_year INT, total_lessons INT, lessons_completed INT);
CREATE TABLE Payment_Records (payment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, student_id UUID, payment_date DATE, payment_amount DECIMAL(10, 2), payment_method VARCHAR(20));
